FuncDef: This command is a container for the configuration parameters controlling the behavior of an HSMDA queue. Unlike the standard QoS policy queue command, this command is not used to create or dynamically assign the queue to the object to which the policy is applied. The queue identified byqueue-idalways exists whether the command is executed or not. For HSMDA SAPs and subscribers, all eight queues exist when the system allocates an HSMDA queue group to the object.

ParaDef.Info: Defines the context from which the eight egress queues will be entered for editing purposes.
